activities: The company collects names, contact details, demographic information and opinions of consumers and other individuals via surveys and other research techniques, including by way of telephone and email;  names, contact details and other information of visitors to the company's Web site; and names, contact details and other information of the company's employees located in the UK.  The research information is used only for research.  The Web visitors' information is used for general marketing purposes.  The employee information is used only to administer the company's relationships with its employees.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line, off-line and manually processed data.
recoursemech: For HR information received from the UK:  UK data protection authority.  For all other types of information received from Europe:  BBB EU Safe Harbor.
